name: iron-node
description: Debug Node.js code with Chrome Developer Tools.

packageJSON.name: iron-node
packageJSON.description: Debug Node.js code on the fly with Chrome Developer Tools on Linux, Windows and OS X.

scripts.bump: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

releases.body:
* :arrow_up: 3.0.17
  * Merge pull request [#126](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/126) from s-a/zion
    Zion
  * fix [#124](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/124)
  * resolve [#122](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/122)
  * - migrate from electron-prebuilt to electron
    - update dependencies (may fix [#119](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/119), may fix [#120](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/120))
    - fix mdlints

# 3.0.14 / 2016-09-30
- :arrow_up: 3.0.14
- eslint
- add eslint
- remove CommandOrControl+W shortcut
- close devtools and ironNode instance via short cuts CommandOrControl+D, CommandOrControl+Q, CommandOrControl+W
- add start script to package.json
- update logo
- update README.md
- update logo/logo.png
- update NATIVE-MODULES.md
- :new: add dev tools extension
- :arrow_up: 3.0.13
- fix [#115](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/115)
- :arrow_up: 3.0.12
- :arrow_up: electron v1.4.1
- update electron version
:arrow_up: electron@1.3.1 fix #114
:arrow_up: electron v1.2.2 fix #106
:arrow_up: electron@1.2.0
fix #104

- Resolve #98 
- Upgrade to Electron 1.1.0
  - Upgrade to Chrome 50.0.2661.102.
  - Upgrade to Node.js 6.1.0.
:arrow_up: electron@1.0.2
:arrow_up: electron@0.37.5

- fix [#89](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/89)
- fix clean up of *.~mp.js on exit on non darwin system
- upgrade electron v0.37.2
- Update CONTRIBUTING.md

- New options to overwrite common browser variables with `undefined`

https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/5195b8b1c3a7649eaba4519604ff8c461bd3f145/.iron-node.js#L6

# 2.1.14 / 2016-01-30
- :arrow_up: Electron@0.36.7 (fix: #86)
- :new: /docs/PROFILE.md
:arrow_up: syntax-error@1.1.5

# 2.1.12 / 2016-01-27
- Prettified error logs
- Better and more detailed error log in case of syntax error

# 2.1.11 / 2016-01-25
- resolved [#78](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/78) (Accept piped data)

# 2.1.9 / 2016-01-23
- resolve [#81](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/81)
  For safety reasons all links in the webview window will now open in an external browser window.
- :x: open module
- updated FEATURES.md
- :arrow_up: LICENSE.md
- updated README.md

# 2.1.8 / 2016-01-16
- updated README.md
- fix product name to "ironNode"
- Merge pull request [#76](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/76) from knownasilya/patch-1
  Change application name to "Iron Node"
- added changelog script
- :arrow_up: electron@0.36.4
  - Fix memory leak in remote module.
  - Fix source code highlighting not working in devtools.

# 2.1.7 / 2016-01-11
- fixed autoAddWorkSpace
- fixed "check for updates"
- fixed runtime error after reload (ctrl+r) and quit (ctrl+w)
- resolved [#63](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/issues/63)
- :arrow_up: should@8.0.2
- :x: ipc
Conditional workspace setup via `.iron-node.js` configuration file. (resolves #63) [example](https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/2f97abc2c5a04b668562034e0bfd97fef7becd8c/.iron-node.js#L14)
removed electron-toaster

Added options to .iron-node.js configuration. While i prefer the old style it is now possible to open the devTools only and hide the main window.
- https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/10ecde9d6c5c96f383998e7c4a895f8e70b231b1/.iron-node.js#L10

Added console log output support for `process.stdout.write`

- :arrow_up: electron-prebuilt@0.36.1
- fixed a bug
resolved jshints

- Upgrade to electron v0.36.0
- Upgrade to Chrome 47.
- Upgrade to Node 5.1.1.

- Added application setting in .iron-node.js for autoAddWorkSpace
  - See https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/master/docs/CONFIGURATION.md and https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/master/.iron-node.js for more details.
- Added https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/master/docs/MASTER-THE-BREAKPOINTS.md
hotfix for #46
fixed #45

- fixed #13
- significantly more performance at debug session start

- Added global and local configuration support.
- Added v8 flags support. https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/master/docs/CONFIGURATION.md
- Added plugins support. https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/master/docs/PACKAGES.md

- Added global and local configuration support.
- Added v8 flags support. 

https://github.com/s-a/iron-node/blob/master/docs/CONFIGURATION.md

- Added plugin support
- Enhanced console logs
- More tested native node modules
- Improved docs!

releases.name: v1.2.16
releases.body:
- New parameter to compile native modules `iron-node --compile`  
- New parameter to use new native compiled modules `iron-node --native`

Added `package.json` information to info window (if exists) .
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1270662/8895780/fdc13ea2-33e5-11e5-92d9-a07499215e25.png)

releases.name: Native uncaught exception error dialog

releases.name: Bugfix
releases.body: Fixed a problem on Linux as described in #7
